comments.content: It looks like **[Berthold City](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161206/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Berthold&ffam=Berthold%20City%20-%20Bold&fid=4ef5a7e383ff2dd1f5352fde4636a9af&fsize=60&text=SACKVILLE%20STORM&wrap=2)** - medium & bold weight
